message.content:
It's challenging to create an entiremeal plan without including ingredients you've mentioned, however here is a healthy and balanced meal plan featuring various fruits, vegetables, lean proteins, and healthy fats:

Monday: 
- 1 cup of fresh spinach 
- 1/2 cup of diced tomatoes 
- 2 cloves of minced garlic 
- 1 tablespoon of olive oil 
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Fresh parsley for garnish

Tuesday: 
- 1 large avocado, sliced 
- 1 red bell pepper, sliced  
- 1 green bell pepper, sliced 
- 1/2 cup of diced tomatoes 
- 2 cloves of minced garlic 
- 1 tablespoon of olive oil 
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Fresh parsley for garnish 

Wednesday: 
- 1 large avocado, sliced 
- 1 red bell pepper, sliced  
- 1 green bell pepper, sliced 
- 1/2 cup of diced tomatoes 
- 2 cloves of minced garlic 
- 1 tablespoon of olive oil 
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Fresh parsley for garnish 

Thursday: 
- 1 large avocado, sliced 
- 1 red bell pepper, sliced  
- 1 green bell pepper, sliced 
- 1/2 cup of diced tomatoes 
- 2 cloves of minced garlic 
- 1 tablespoon of olive oil 
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Fresh parsley for garnish 

Friday: 
- 1 large avocado, sliced 
- 1 red bell pepper, sliced  
- 1 green bell pepper, sliced 
- 1/2 cup of diced tomatoes 
- 2 cloves of minced garlic 
- 1 tablespoon of olive oil 
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Fresh parsley for garnish 

Saturday & Sunday: 
- Cooked rice or pasta 
- Serve with your favorite salad, soup, stew, or dish that includes fresh fruits, vegetables, nuts, seeds, legumes, or grains. To make it more balanced, serve this meal with a side of healthy steamed veggies, quinoa, whole wheat bread, roasted veggies, or other healthy snacks. Enjoy your healthful meals!
